meta.title: Mr. Whisk vs Neon Pancake Cyclone

beats.visual: Mr. Whisk flicks on the neon mixer; batter glows neon.
beats.gag_note: Mixer hum builds like a superhero transformation.

beats.visual: Mixer blasts pancake spiral; Mr. Whisk leaps onto the counter island.
beats.gag_note: Kitchen utensils salute as the cyclone forms.

beats.visual: Spinning pancakes orbit fridge magnets cheering in speech bubbles.
Mr. Whisk rides a spatula surfboard through the batter vortex.
Neon batter splashes window; Mr. Whisk winks at viewers mid-spin.
beats.gag_note: Fourth-wall break with batter smiley face.

beats.visual: Mr. Whisk slow-motion dodges syrup comet streaking past ears.
Cyclone gulps toaster; Mr. Whisk slaps giant off switch with tail.
Batter rains confetti; fridge prints instant replay for crowd.
Ceiling drip forms pancake halo as Mr. Whisk takes a bow.

tts_line: Mr. Whisk upgrades breakfast to pancake parkour mode.
